message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and quality, I estimate its worth to be $10,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it for $9,500. This special offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value proposition. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can finalize the details promptly.
